title: Kuroi Kikori to Shiroi Kikori

alternative_titles.en: The Black Woodcutter and the White Woodcutter
alternative_titles.ja: 黒いきこりと白いきこり

synopsis:
Within a wintry forest live two woodcutters: one clad in black and the other in white. While the black-clad woodcutter sees no consequences for exploiting the forest's resources as much as he can, the white-clad woodcutter strives to live in harmony with the forest creatures. As the chill of winter grows ever harsh, only time will tell which of their strategies will allow them to prosper.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
